about_the_game:
COLLEGE KINGS 2 - EPISODE 2: THE POOL PARTY REWORKED

THE REWORK

As of 26th September 2023, College Kings 2 - Episode 2 'The Pool Party' has officially been reworked. The entire episode has been revisited by the team in collaboration with the community and their feedback.

EPISODE 2

Tensions on the campus are high, the college is clamping down on the frats, and a mysterious social media page has students paranoid and on edge. Join the Social Planning Committee and work to bring the campus back together. Your first job? Organize the ultimate blow-out Pool Party! We’re going to need inflatables, beach balls and bikinis.

EPIC EVENTS & INTRIGUE

San Vallejo College is in turmoil. With the frats receiving a warning from the college administration, tension is high. Amidst the chaos, an anonymous social media page, SVC Rejects, is stoking the flames of paranoia on campus. As you navigate these challenges, join forces with fellow students and teachers to revive the Social Planning Committee. Their first project? Host the ultimate pool party to promote unity and blow off some steam.

AUTHENTIC RELATIONSHIPS & DECISIONS

Your choices have never been more crucial. Forge meaningful relationships with a diverse cast of characters, each with their own hopes, dreams, and secrets. Whether it's a casual fling, deep friendship, or committed romance, every decision you make will shape your journey through San Vallejo college.

MORE THAN A TRADITIONAL AVN

Explore the world of College Kings with free-roam mechanics and engage in intense turn-based fight sequences. Your choices carry weight, affecting your reputation, alliances, and the very fabric of college life. Discover hidden content, side stories, and experience something new with every playthrough.

IMMERSIVE ADULT CONTENT

College Kings is best known for its interactive adult scenes, and the Episode 2 rework takes it up a notch with a bunch of new and exciting sex scenes with your favourite girls to be discovered! Relive your favourite moments using the scene selector, and choose which fantasies to explore. With integration for all Lovense toys, immerse yourself deeper than ever into the wildest college experience.

ABOUT COLLEGE KINGS

Embark on a choice-driven adventure in College Kings, where you immerse yourself in a world of parties, romance, and raw college drama. As a freshman, navigate the complexities of college life, making choices that influence your relationships and the unfolding narrative.

College Kings 2 - Episode 2 requires the base game College Kings 2 – Episode 1 on Steam. Each episode is released as DLC, continuing the sensual story of College Kings.

content_descriptors.notes: College Kings contains sexual depictions, violence and drug references that some viewers may find offensive. All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are 18 years old and over. This Adult Visual Novel is not intended for audiences under 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Continue your adventure at San Vallejo College in the Reworked Episode 2 of College Kings 2 - 'The Pool Party'. An epic pool party blowout, bikinis and sunscreen massages abound. Dive into a world of parties, sex and love as a college freshman and make your wildest fantasies come true.
